category_description_en: This category contains info on study design (case-control, other parameters that were designed by the study)
This category contains info on study agreement

This category contains all kinds of personal info that can be relevant for health: birth date, sex, age , no of child from biological mother. Note that we add handedness to that (just to give it a place). Due to GDPR reasons for some variables only the questions will be available in the database

This category contains all kinds of info that can be used in order to contact participants: name, telephone numbers, email. Due to GDPR reasons, only the questions will be available in the database. Note that current and previous addresses and geo information are contained in the category region (if available due to GDPR)
This category contains all questions related to alcohol use and own recreational drug use
This category contains all info related to country of birth, nationality and language
This category contains the marital status and family composition: How many family members are there, how many live in the house, how many children
This category contains eductional info (current or in the past) and degree of education
This category contains all variables related to occupation and income

This category contains questions including current and historical adress, hotspot zone, whether it is a deprived neighborhood, etc. The questions can be asked in the questionnaire to the participant, but it can also be environmental information that is available on geo coordinates or community level

This category contains all info on the outer shell of the house like materials used, renovations done,etc. All things that are not changing even if the house would be sold and new owners come in. It also contains the info if it is an appartment or a house, whether it contains lead tubes, etc.
This category contains all questions related to ventilation systems in the house

This category contains all kinds of questions related to problems that can occur in the house: water leaks, moisture, mold, rot, condensation on windows, if there is a draft entering the house, if there has been a fire,....

This category contains all indoor housing characteristics that can be relatively easy adapted. It includes carpets (new or old), curtains, painting, how many electronical devices,.. It also includes behaviour like cooking,candle burning, etc. Note that it also contains the use of aromatic sprays or pesticides inside the house. Note that cleaning information and ventilation is kept as seperate categories. productgebruik dat aan de woning gebonden is en niet persoonsgebonden
identiek aan' Housing - Ventilation systems' ???

This category contains all questions related to cleaning habits and cleaning products (often questioned is the use of javel). It also contains questions like "Do you also mop the floor with water after vacuuming?"

category_key: Indoor Energy, combustion behaviour and engines
category_description_en: This category contains everything linked to EPC level of house, heating the house, combustion behaviour, etc. It also contains questions like parked cars in areas linked to the house.
category_name_en: Indoor Energy, combustion behaviour and engines

category_description_en: This category contains all questions related to terrace and garden (but not related to kitchen garden or chicken run because they have their own category). This category can also include questions on compost if it is not specific for a kitchen garden. It also includes questions on the use of pesticides (again if it is not used in the kitchengarden)

This category contains all questions related to kitchen garden. It can include compost or pesticides if it is used in the kitchengarden. At 3xG we also ask to persons that eat vegetables from their own kitchen garden if they ever asked a company to analyse a soil sample. Note that we have a special category for  consumption of vegetables from their own kitchen garden  (Nution and Diet-local food),
This category contains all questions on ground and well water and the use of this water  ook consumptie?

This category contains all questions related to domestic animals like cats and dogs and other animals (even farm animals in house or garden). Note that we have a special category for chickens as they are very much questionned
This category contains all questions related to chicken. It can be about the size of the chicken run, how much of it is grass or soil, on what the chickens eat, on the age of the chickens, etc.

This category contains all questions on general food consumption like basic diet (vegetarian, gluten free,etc.) but also like if you use fresh butter or margarine or nothing on your bread. This category contains the "facts", not the "feelings or perceptions on food". That is another category! Note that questions on general food frequency are also contained in a separate category

This category contains questions that indicate how much somebody eats certain general foods. An example is "how often do you eat fish". We might still decide in future to split them up in fruit & veggies, meat & fish?

category_key: Local and/or own food consumption and frequency
category_description_en:
This category contains all questions on local food consumption and frequency of local food consumption. If the local food is bio, then it will also be categorised in local food. If questions are posed combined for local and own kitchen garden food, then we also categorise it under local food. Questions like "How often do you eat caught fish" also belong here. Whenever a question is asked about pesticides used on local food, then this question is categorised here (also categorised in local food)
ook consumptie van eigen putwater?
category_name_en: Local and/or own food consumption and frequency

category_key: Local and/or own kitchen garden food
category_description_en: This category contains all questions on own grown food consumption. Note that the properties of the kitchen garden do have their own category
category_name_en: Local and/or own kitchen garden food

category_description_en: This category contains all questions on egg consumption from local and/or own chicken. It can also contain comparison of how many of the eggs you eat are from own kitchen garden
This category contains all questions related to non-local bio-food and frequency of eating local and non-local bio-food
This category contains food supplements (and thus no medication). This can by iron, folic acid vitamin D, etc.
This category contains all questions related to baby feeding because it is very specific: Questions on how much breast milk, bottle feeding, names of brands for bottle feeding, etc.
This category contains all questions on walking, working in the garden, playing (for children), playing with children, sports and hobbies, etc. Screen time is here also!
This category contains all questions related to the means of transport during commuting (to work or school) and the time spent on commuting
Sedentary behaviour
This category contains all questions related to active smoking now and in the past
This category contains all questions related to care products, make-up, perfume, whether you use fabric softener when you wash your clothes. It also contains questions on pearcing and earrings
This category contains all questions related to bathing and showering. Using soap and other products, etc.
This category contains all questions related to tooth care, dental fillings
This category contains all questions related to hair care: how often you wash your hair, what products you use,etc.
This category contains all questions related to nail care
This category contains questions such as: Did your mother smoke during pregnancy. Also age of the mother at birth???
This category contains questions such as: does the child go to daycare, to the creche, or to the grandparents? Does the child frequent a swimming pool?
This category contains questions such as: does the child go to before and after school care or to the grandparents? Does the child frequent a swimming pool?
This category contains all questions related to passive smoking or being in rooms/cars where other people smoke

This category is specific for products specific for the person (also professional is asked together with personal or hobby) that are used indoor or outdoors and that are not for personal care and hygiene or for cleaning.  Note that the difference between this category and the indoor environment is not so easy. For now we say here products that are not related to the house. We have to see that and clear out this explanation!!!

This category is there for questions that are related only to occupational exposure. Whenever it is asked for professional but also personal or hobby, then it will be categorized in the personal exposure to products categories. Current occupation is also categorised in occupational exposure
??????Residence

category_key: Environmental exposure due to traffic and combustion
category_description_en: This category contains information on environmental exposure due to traffic in special. Exposure to traffic, busy roads, traffic lights, NO2, PM, BC, ozon concentrations concentrations. benzinestation (zowel vragen in vragenlijst van bvb hoever woon je van een drukke weg of een benzinestation als metingen die we extern verkregen hebben). In 3xG there is a indoor questionnaire that asks questions on effects on indoor air quality related to big traffic roads or fuel stations in the neighbourhood. This will also be categorised here.
category_name_en: Environmental exposure due to traffic and combustion

category_description_en: This category contains information on yellow area : agriculture
This category contains exposure info on grey area : industry

category_key: Environmental exposure due to build environment
category_description_en: This category contains exposure info on grey area : build environment. This contains for example the density of buildings (lintbebouwing, kernbebouwing)
category_name_en: Environmental exposure due to build environment

category_key: Environmental exposure due to air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance
category_level2_en: Air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance
category_description_en: This category contains information on environmental exposure due to air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance. But not related to traffic since that has its own category
category_name_en: Environmental exposure due to air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance

category_key: Environmental exposure due to green area
category_description_en: This category contains information on exposure to green area
category_name_en: Environmental exposure due to green area

category_key: Environmental exposure due to climate and changing climate
category_description_en: This category contains climate and weather data. For the moment, it is the Temperature, sunflux from KMI, pollen data van Sciensano
category_name_en: Environmental exposure due to climate and changing climate

category_description_en: This category contains questions on general environmental exposure that cannot be put in one of the other categories

category_key: Perception on exposure due to climate and changing climate
category_level2_en: Perception on exposure due to climate and changing climate
category_description_en: This category contains questions related to climate and changing climate
category_name_en: Perception on exposure due to climate and changing climate

category_key: Perception on exposure due to food
category_description_en: This category contains questions on perception, concerns and opinions on food. Also questions on the importance of food, eating together, reasons for a specific diet, reasons for buying bio food, etc.
category_name_en: Perception on exposure due to food

category_key: Perception on exposure due to indoor environment
category_description_en: This category contains questions perception, concerns and opinions about indoor environment. Do you think ventilation is important? Or not smoking in the house?
category_name_en: Perception on exposure due to indoor environment

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to traffic and combustion
category_description_en: This category is about your perception, concerns and opinions about traffic and combustion,
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to traffic and combustion

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to agriculture
category_description_en: This category is about your perception, concerns and opinions about exposure due to agriculture in general
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to agriculture

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to industry
category_description_en: This category is about your perception, concerns and opinions about exposure due to industry. For example, air pollution due to industry, do you think it is bad for your health. And who do you trust for information?
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to industry

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to build environment
category_description_en: This category is about your perception, concerns and opinions about spatial (land us) planning  ????
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to build environment

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance
category_level2_en: Air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance ook licht pollutie?
category_description_en: This category is about your perception, concerns and opinions about exposure to air pollution, noise and odor nuisance
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to air pollution, noise pollution, odor nuisance

category_key: Perception on exposure exposure due to green area
category_description_en: This category is about questions on your perception of how important green is for you for sporting, walking,etc. It answers questions that start with "how important  isetc.", or "do you think...".  Note that there is a separate category for measurements on green area (for example the distance from your house to a parc or wood).
category_name_en: Perception on exposure exposure due to green area

category_description_en: This category contains recent exposure information relevant for recent exposure and not for general exposure
This category contains recent illness or medication information relevant for recent illnesses and not for general health
This category contains recent nutrition information relevant for recent nutricion and not for food categories

This category contains all measured health outcome in the group of cardiometabolic parameters (height, weight and BMI, blood pressure) but not metabolic hormones and questions on cardiovascular health and metabolic health.

category_key: Lab markers for cardiometabolic health and metabolic diseases
category_description_en: This category contains all measured health outcome in the group of cardiometabolic parameters (height, weight and BMI, blood pressure) but not metabolic hormones and questions on cardiovascular health and metabolic health.
category_name_en: Lab markers for cardiometabolic health and metabolic diseases

category_description_en: This category contains all measured inflammation and immune parameters (eNO, lungcapacity, FOT, EBC, cytokinesetc.) and contains questions on inflammation
This category contains all measured health outcome at birth (from the kindfiche)

This category contains all questions on general health like sore throat, headaches, migraine, hearing and tinnitus, recollection and memory, respiratory symptoms, etc, that are not as specifically and detailed questioned so that they have their own category
This category contains all questions related to problems with breathing, allergy and ashtma. It contains questions on the disease and medication specific for the disease ook longfunctietesten??
This category contains all questions related to medication and vaccination. Note that questions on medication for the specific diseases are put in the specific category of the disease
This category contains all questions on hospitalisations, surgery, injury, etc.

category_key: Historical and prevalent chronic diseases or conditions
category_level3_en: Historical and prevalent chronic diseases or conditions
category_description_en: This category contains questions on historical and prevalent chronic diseases or conditions
category_name_en: Historical and prevalent chronic diseases or conditions

category_description_en: This category contains all questions about family history of disease
This category contains special questions on health that are only posed to pregnant women
This category contains info on medication during pregnancy
This category contains info on food supplements during pregnancy
This category contains special questions on health that are only posed to women relevant to giving birth
This category contains special questions on health related to health that are only posed to women that are breast feeding

This category contains questions on mental health oa feeling score, vitality score. It answers the question "how do you feel". You can feel exhausted, or full of energy. For children we have a separate category "general child behaviour" that answers the question "how do you behave" in certain situations.
This category contains questions on stress
This category contains questions on stress during pregnancy
This category contains questions on sleeping habits and problems
This category contains all questions related to problems with neuro-cognition
This category contains all computer test to asses neurocognition eg Stroop, This category includes all age classes,
This category contains all general questions related to menstruation
This category contains all questions on hormone use, incl. oral contraceptives, hormone replacement therapy
This category contains all questions related to fertility, incl. infertility treatments, time to pregnancy
This category contains all general questions on pregnancy, not related to exposure for a specific child that is also part of the study
This category contains all general questions on breast feeding not related to a specific child that is also part of the study

This category contains all birth questions that relate to a specific child that is also part of the study. For example, all questions from the "kindfiche" that are not measurements about the child will belong to this category (except for measurements that will belong to clinical data   Health outcome).
This category contains all questions on general child behaviour. Things like is your child often angry, sad, happy, mean, does he take into account feelings of others, etc.
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions. For the moment we have here 3xG 6M questions related to what your child can do
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions. This is the first out of 5 categories used during 3xG for child development
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions. This is the second out of 5 categories used during 3xG for child development
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions.  This is the third out of 5 categories used during 3xG for child development
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions.  This is the fourth out of 5 categories used during 3xG for child development
This category was created for 3xG because neuro was questionned in such a detail that we want to group the questions.  This is the fifth out of 5 categories used during 3xG for child development
This category contains all questions on puberty that are not related to CLB data. Note that menstration is also a separate category
This category contains all questions related to puberty that are questioned by CLB

This category contains variables like the date of questionnaire sending, date of filling in questionnaire, who filled in the questionnaire, if questionnaire is filled in on paper or electronically, remarks on questionnaire

This category contains all data relevant to the sampling and quality of sampling, like the sampling date, that are not specific to one type of sample or that are not of the specific types that have their own sub-category
This category contains all data relevant to the blood sampling collection, like if a person was sober, sampling time, if a sample is available
This category contains all data relevant to the cordblood  collection, like collection time, if a sample is available, volume

category_key: Sample information on mother milk collection
category_description_en: This category contains all sampling information on mother milk collection
category_name_en: Sample information on mother milk collection

category_description_en: This category contains all sampling information relevant to the quality of the hair sample (eg. Hair is too short)
This category contains all sampling information related to the urine collection. For example if a person forgot the morning collection and thus delivers an on-spot collection
Phthalates  This category contains measurements of phtalates in different human and non-human matrices.
DINCH
Per-/poly-fluorinated compounds (PFASs)
Flame retardants
Bisphenols
Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons (PAHs)
Anilines and MOCA
Pesticides
Pesticides and pyrethroids
Pesticides (carbamate)
Aprotic solvents
Diisocyanates
UV-filters (benzophenones)
Metals
Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs)
Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs)
Hexamoll DINCH
Volatile anaesthetics
Parabens
Musks
Triclosan
UV-screens
Halogens
This category contains all measurements of vitamins in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of essential elements  in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of liver function
This category contains all measurements of urinary dilution eg creatinine, sg.

category_level2_en: Todo: nog aan te vullen: effect merker die geen categorie heeft
category_description_en: tijdelijk
category_name_en: effect categorie nog aan te vullen

category_key: Blood Lipids and lipid transport proteins
category_level2_en: Blood Lipids and lipid transport proteins
category_description_en: This category contains all measurements of blood lipids and lipid transport proteins in blood.
category_name_en: Blood Lipids and lipid transport proteins

category_description_en: This category contains all measurements of vitamins in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of MOLECULAR AND CLINICAL kidney functions in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of steroids/sex hormones in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of thyroid hormones in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of metabolic hormones in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements of stress hormones in human biological material. Eg cortisol in hair
This category contains all measurements of genotoxicity in human biological material. Eg comet assy, micronucleus, telomer length, mitochondriaal DNA
This category contains all measurements of cell growth and cancermarkers in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements related to cell aging in human biological material.
This category contains all measurements related to nicotine
This category contains all measurements related to cytokines
This category contains all measurements related to epigenetic markers
This category contains all measurements related to reproductive and metabolic health outcomes
Furans
Herbicides
Dioxins
Glycol ethers

category_level2_en: Todo exposure merker diegeen categorie heeft
category_description_en: tijdelijk
category_name_en: exposure categorie nog aan te vullen

category_description_en: Property of soil
Property of blood
Property of urine
Acrylamide
Mycotoxins
Alkaloid
Organochlorine compounds (OCs)
Care products

The sampletypes in which we measure can also have properties that are not directly markers, but are measured in the lab. This can be ph of soil, and other characteristics that need to be kept in the database
